locale.no_translation: DUE 2 TEH NACHUR OV DIS PAEG, TEH ONLY OFFISHUL VERSHUN OV DIS CONTENT IZ IN ENGLISH.

index.tagline: DISCOVR, PULAY, AN CREATE MINECRAFT CONTENT
index.description: FIND ENJOYABLE AN QUALITY CONTENT THRU R OPEN-SOURCE MODDIN PLATFORM BUILT 4 DA COMMUNITY. CREATE STUFF, GIT PAID*, AN DEPLOY UR PROJECT WIF R FULLY DOCUMENTD API!

book.title: EASY 2 USE API
book.description: BAKD BY FULLY DOCUMENTD API FACILITATIN TEH GROWTH OV 3RD PARTY INTEGRASHUNS & LAUNCHERS.

coin.title: CREATOR EARNINGS
coin.description: PLANNIN 2 GIV CREATORS 100% OV AD REVENUE FRUM THEIR PROJECT PAGEZ. *PAYOUTS R CURRENTLY IN DEVELOPMENT.

speedometer.title: LIGHTNIN-FAST SEARCH
speedometer.description: POWERD BY FAST AN ADAPTABLE SEARCH ALGORITHMS SO U DOAN HAS 2 WAIT.

chat.title: HELPFUL COMMUNITY
chat.description: GIT SUPPORT, DEVELOP, AN HANG OUT ON R DISCORD SERVR WIF OVAR 1,500 MEMBERS.

puzzle.title: EXTENSIBLE BY DESIGN
puzzle.description: INTEGRATEZ WIF BUILD TOOLS, REPOSITORIEZ, LAUNCHERS, AN CUSTOM APPLICASHUNS.

tools.title: FULLY OPEN SOURCE
tools.description: AN OPEN SOURCE PROJECT MAINTAIND BY AN ACTIV COMMUNITY DAT WELCOMEZ CONTRIBUSHUNS.

message.404:
UH OH, LOOKZ LIEK U GOT LOST IN DA [Labyrinth](https://github.com/modrinth/labrinth).
TEH PAEG U R LOOKIN 4 CUD NOT BE FINDZ.
message.project_missing: TEH {type} U WUZ LOOKIN 4 CANT BE FINDZ.

gallery.confirm: R U SURE U WANTS 2 DELETE DIS GALLERY IMAGE?

ownership.title: OWNERSHIP
ownership.description: TRANZFR OWNERSHIP OV DIS PROJECT 2 ANOTHR USR.

delete.description: DELETIN PROJECT ERASEZ ALL PROJECT DATA, INCLUDIN VERSHUNS.

new.description: INCLUDE LINKZ AN IMAGEZ IF POSIBLE. MARKDOWN FORMATTIN IZ SUPPORTD.

delete.title: DELETE AKOWNT
delete.body: ONCE U DELETE UR AKOWNT, THAR IZ NO GOIN BAK. DELETIN UR AKOWNT WILL REMOOV ALL ATTACHD DATA, INCLUDIN PROJECTS, FRUM R SERVERS.
delete.confirm_title: R U SURE U WANTS 2 DELETE UR AKOWNT?
delete.confirm_body:
DIS WILL **IMMEDIATELY DELETE ALL OV UR PROJECTS** AN FOLLOWS. DELETIN UR AKOWNT CANT BE REVERSD.

IF U NED HALP WIF UR AKOWNT, GIT SUPPORT ON TEH [Modrinth Discord](/discord).

auth.title: AUTHORIZASHUN TOKEN
auth.body: UR AUTHORIZASHUN TOKEN CAN BE USD WIF TEH MODRINTH API, TEH MINOTAUR GRADLE PLUGIN, AN OTHR APPLICASHUNS DAT INTERACT WIF MODRINTHS API. BE SURE 2 KEEP DIS SEEKRET!

revoke_token.title: REVOKE UR MODRINTH TOKEN
revoke_token.body:
REVOKIN UR MODRINTH TOKEN CAN HAS UNINTENDD CONSEQUENCEZ. PLZ BE AWARE DAT TEH FOLLOWIN CUD BREAK:
 - ANY APPLICASHUN DAT USEZ UR TOKEN 2 ACCES TEH API.
 - GRADLE - IF MINOTAUR IZ GIVEN INCORRECT TOKEN, UR GRADLE BUILDZ CUD FAIL.
 - GITHUB - IF U USE GITHUB ACSHUN DAT USEZ TEH MODRINTH API, IT WILL CAUSE ERRORS.

IF U R WILLIN 2 CONTINUE, COMPLETE TEH FOLLOWIN STEPS:

 1. HEAD 2 TEH [MODRINTH APPLICASHUN PAEG ON GITHUB](HTTPS://GITHUB.COM/SETTINGS/CONNECSHUNS/APPLICASHUNS/3ACFFB2E808D16D4B226). MAK SURE 2 BE LOGGD INTO TEH GITHUB AKOWNT U USD 4 MODRINTH!
 2. PRES TEH HOOJ RED "REVOKE ACCES" BUTN NEXT 2 TEH "PERMISHUNS" HEADR.

ONCE U HAS COMPLETD DOSE STEPS, PRES TEH CONTINUE BUTN BELOW.

**DIS WILL LOG U OUT OV MODRINTH, HOWEVR, WHEN U LOG BAK IN, UR TOKEN WILL BE REGENERATD.**

images.how_to: DRAG AN DROP 2 UPLOAD OR CLICK 2 SELECT

ads.privacy_respecting: A PRIVACY-RESPECTIN AD WUD HAS BEEN SHOWN HER.

console.line2: UR ADBLOCKR PREVENTD MODRINTH FRUM SHOWIN AN AD, R ONLY SOURCE OV INCOME.
console.line3: IF U STILL WANTS 2 HALP MODRINTH WITHOUT VIEWIN ADZ, U CAN CONTRIBUTE 2 MODRINTH ON GITHUB!
